title: Language of Love
description: Robin Mackin's thrilled when she finds out that she's been chosen for her high school's exchange program to Switzerland — until she hears that Henry Bouchet, her archrival from French class, is going too.Henry is infuriating — he's always trying to outdo Robin. And just because he's great-looking, speaks terrific French, and can be positively charming, he has the nerve to think she likes him! What's worse is that Robin isn't always so sure she doesn't.How will Robin ever be able to stand three weeks in Switzerland with Henry? And afterwards, will they be best friends or worst enemies?
author: Rosemary Vernon
